content: on rn then slip st back from ln to rn abbreviations step 4 p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end approx = approximately bobble = bind off top bor = beginning of round circ = circular co = cast on increase d = increase d next round *k1 p1 repeat from * to end dpn = double pointed needle repeat above round until measures approx 2 3 /5 k = knit ln = left needle 7 5 cm since closing thumbhole p = purl patt = pattern bobble in pattern pm = place marker repeat = repeat rn = right needle round s = round s finishing rs = right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side weave in ends & block if desired www elizabethsmithknits com 2 elizabeth smith k n i t s find me online website elizabethsmithknits com pattern support email me at info@elizabethsmithknits com sharing on social media make sure to tag me @elizabethsmithknits i love to see finished photos images and pattern © 2019 elizabeth smith knits/the brown stitch llc all rights reserved www elizabethsmithknits com 3
